title: Thriller Paradise - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Martial Arts   Mystery   Psychological   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Antihero Protagonist   Artificial Intelligence   Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Fanfiction   Fearless Protagonist   Friendship   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Level System   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Narcissistic Protagonist   Playful Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Quirky Characters   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Slow Romance   Stoic Characters   Unlimited Flow   Unlucky Protagonist   Virtual Reality   Writers

description:
This is a game that surpasses dimensions.

It is also a competition for the search of truth.

Unknown seals, a game of chance with ghosts and gods…

The digital struggle, the redemption of humans…

In the virtual world that links with reality—It consciously decided us. It consciously chose us. It consciously decided our consciousness.

And now, throw away your fear.

Throw away your selfish thoughts, questions, and resistance… Free your mind.

Welcome to: Thriller Paradise.>
